altername_name: Shi San Zhang Ma Jiang 98: Mei Shao Nv
Shì Sān Zhàng Ma Jiàng 98: Méi Shāo Nv
name: Shi San Zhang Ma Jiang 98: Mei Shao Nv
overview: Shi San Zhang Ma Jiang 98: Mei Shao Nv (十三張麻将98 美少女) is one of several unlicensed pornographic mahjong games developed in Taiwan for the Sega Mega Drive. This game should not be confused with Shi San Zhang Ma Jiang: Zhong Guo Mei Nv Pian.
